snippet: Kevin Garratt and his wife lived near the border with North Korea and were detained in August; she has been released on bail.
abstract: China formally detains Kevin Garratt, Canadian man tied to Christian group providing aid to North Koreans across border from China, on suspicion of stealing state secrets; releases the man's wife after holding the couple for six months without charge.

byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa.

lead_paragraph: Kevin Garratt and his wife lived near the border with North Korea and were detained in August; she has been released on bail.

headline.main: China Holds a Canadian It Says Stole State Secrets
